attributes.action: stop leisure centres from selling sweets,choclate in vendor machines
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as we all know leisure centres are supposed to promote health,and wellbeing,we also know that obseity is on the increase espically in children. Many leisure centres sell choclate,sweets,crisps through hired vending machines,surely this is the wrong message, they supposed to promote healthier lifestyles ,so why allow them to have vending machines, these leisure centres are council run, so why not stop the local authroties from allowing these centres to have vending machines??? lets put a stop to this now and help prevent obseity.
